summary: *obsolete* A nice set of useful functions
name: bufNwinUtils.vim
description:
This script is not maintained any more. I have renamed it to genutils.vim and added many more functions. Unless you are using a very old version of one of my other scripts, that require this, you should download the new script, genutils.vim

(http://vim.sourceforge.net/scripts/script.php?script_id=197

-----------

Defines the following functions:

- NumberOfWindows
- FindWindowForBuffer
- FindBufferForName
- SaveWindowSettings
- RestoreWindowSettings

And other misc. functions.
install_details: Source it or drop it in plugin directory.

versions.release_notes: New functions to store and restore virtual intelligent positions. This is like having additional markers over the builtin a-z makers. I have extracted the idea from explorer.vim
